title: Analyze Draft PPA Contract for Risks
description: A legal analyst needs to review a draft Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) from a potential off-taker and identify any non-standard or high-risk clauses.

tasks.description: Parse the uploaded PPA contract document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully ingests and structures the contract text.

tasks.description: Compare the key clauses (e.g., price escalator, curtailment compensation, force majeure) against a library of standard PPA terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent flags several clauses that deviate from the company's standard template.

tasks.description: Summarize the identified risks and suggest alternative language for the high-risk clauses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report for the legal team with a list of issues and recommended changes.
